title: Login page not loading
description: User reports that the login page is stuck on loading spinner.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer did not receive the password reset email after multiple attempts.

title: Error 500 on checkout
description: Server returns error 500 when trying to complete checkout.

title: Unable to upload profile picture
description: Profile picture upload fails with timeout error.

title: Mobile app crashes on launch
description: App crashes immediately on Android 12 devices.

title: Invoice PDF not generating
description: PDF invoices show a blank page when downloaded.

title: Search function slow
description: Searching products takes more than 30 seconds to return results.

title: Notification emails not sending
description: Users are not receiving notifications for new messages.

title: Incorrect total on shopping cart
description: The total amount in cart does not include tax correctly.

title: Unable to change account settings
description: Settings page does not save changes for email preferences.

title: Payment gateway timeout
description: Payments fail due to gateway timeout errors intermittently.

title: Broken link on FAQ page
description: FAQ link to 'Return Policy' page returns 404 error.

title: Chat support not loading
description: Live chat window does not appear on the website.

title: App notifications delayed
description: Push notifications arrive hours after triggering events.

title: Data export fails
description: Exporting user data to CSV throws an unknown error.
